ProductInfo.Features:
**WATERPROOF** Professional grade high quality video camera, Ultra High Resolution 620 Day Color 0.05, 670 B&W; Night Vision 0 luX, Vandal Proof IP68 Casing for indoor/outdoor
1/3" Super HAD Sony CCD III Image Sensor, Built in 25IR LEDs for up to 60ft illumination, 4.3mm lens
Ivory Color Casing blends nicely with wall or ceiling mountable, Vandal Proof, Water-Proof, Weather Proof IP 68 Case
Wall or Ceiling mountable with 4-Axis bracket for easier to angle camera, Auto Gain Control, Auto White Balance, Made in Korea for high quality standard
Package include: Dome Night Vision Camera & 12v1500mA (1.5Amps) high power adapter
ProductInfo.Name: PROFESSIONAL GRADE WATERPROOF VANDALPROOF COLOR DAY & NIGHT VISION ULTRA HIGH 620 / 670 RESOLUTION DOME INFRARED 25IR LED 4.3MM LENS FOR INDOOR / OUTDOOR
